publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7511 Shona Robison: The Sale of Tobacco (Registration of Moveable Structures and Fixed Penalty Notices) Regulations 2010—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the Sale of Tobacco (Registration of Moveable Structures and Fixed Penalty Notices) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*

S3M-7511 Shona Robison: The Sale of Tobacco (Registration of Moveable Structures and Fixed Penalty Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2010—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the Sale of Tobacco (Registration of Moveable Structures and Fixed Penalty Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon
